subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Connecticut Coach Jim Calhoun said forward Stanley Robinson would spend at least one semester away from college. Robinson plans to take courses at a junior college near his home in Birmingham, Ala., while addressing academic and personal issues.
snippet: Connecticut Coach Jim Calhoun said forward Stanley Robinson would spend at least one semester away from college. Robinson plans to take courses at a junior college near his home in Birmingham, Ala., while addressing academic and personal issues.
